about.summary: Asset management for Flask, to compress and merge CSS and Javascript files.

name: flask-assets
raw_meta_yaml:
{%set name = "Flask-Assets" %}
{%set version = "0.12" %}
{%set compress_type = "tar.gz" %}
{%set hash_type = "sha256" %}
{%set hash_val = "6031527b89fb3509d1581d932affa5a79dd348cfffb58d0aef99a43461d47847" %}
{%set build_num = "0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.{{ compress_type }}
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.{{ compress_type }}
  {{ hash_type }}: {{ hash_val }}
  patches:
      # patch fixes a label for utf-8 encoding - see https://github.com/miracle2k/flask-assets/pull/117
      - setup.patch

build:
  preserve_egg_dir: True
  noarch: python

  number: {{ build_num }}
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools

  run:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - flask >=0.8
    - webassets >=0.11.1

test:
  imports:
    - flask_assets

about:
  home: http://github.com/miracle2k/flask-assets
  license: BSD 2-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE
  license_family: BSD
  summary: 'Asset management for Flask, to compress and merge CSS and Javascript files.'
  doc_url: https://flask-assets.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: http://github.com/miracle2k/flask-assets

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - pmlandwehr
